Text: don't know if its the real deal or what but its got 638 pages...just for the kind info of anybody wishing to download this book....

Sofar this is the best one ive found. Imo its easier to read, Doubled Spaced, more formatted with page numbers and titles on each page. Most others were single spaced and just very basic (those are good if u want a short small pdf with only 400pages vs this 1 with 600+)
also compared it to the official book word for word randomly and it was exact on words/paragraphs/format
What program do i need to open this?i thought microsoft word would do it -_-

Not 100% sure but looks real i havent bought the book yet but it seems ok good format and easy to read if anyone knows if this is legit please post if so i dont want to get started reading and find out its missing stuff from the book when i get my copy thanks and good upload either way.
It is word for word real, i have the book right beside me, i just needed a more mobile version.

Loving the format of this, really neat & looks awesome! This is totally real, the whole scar thing is not true, the last word is 'well'!
The layout just looks really nice & it's properly numbered!

Check out the next novels in line...Harry's son...

(01) James Potter and the Hall of Elders' Crossing http://www.speedbumpstudios.com/chapters/JPHEC.pdf

(02) James Potter and the Curse of the Gatekeeper http://www.gatekeeperscurse.com/chapters/JPCG_complete.pdf

(03) James Potter and the Vault of Destinies http://www.jamespotterseries.com/chapters/JPVOD_final.pdf
I believe this is indeed a real copy, however I have encountered a few spelling mistakes a few pages into the book. Thanks for the upload anyhow.
